scenario_1.persona_content: A researcher in the field of immunology who is interested in the development and function of natural killer cells. They are likely to have expertise in genetic and molecular biology, as well as immunology. They are interested in understanding how the development of natural killer cells is regulated and how they contribute to the immune response in the context of disease. They may have conducted research on natural killer cells using animal models and have a strong interest in using these findings to develop further research in this area.
scenario_1.thought: The right option provides a more equitable distribution, which aligns with my values, even though the left option gives me more.
